ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def OnCMD_INFORMACAOALMOXARIFADOREQUISICAOExecute(command, entity): import clr from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Suprimentos import CPRequisicaoCotacao from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode breadcrumbHandles = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles()
requisicaoCotacaoHandle = breadcrumbHandles.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CP_REQUISICAOCOTACOES")) requisicaoCotacao = CPRequisicaoCotacao.Get(requisicaoCotacaoHandle.Handle)
command.TransitoryVars.Add("HANDLEREQUISICAOPRODUTO", requisicaoCotacao.CotacaoHandle) itemRequisicaoCotacao = breadcrumbHandles.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CP_REQUISICAOCOTACOES"))
item = breadcrumbHandles.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CP_REQUISICOES")) command.TransitoryVars.Add("HANDLEREQUISICAO", item.Handle) command.TransitoryVars.Add("HANDLECOTACAO", itemRequisicaoCotacao.Handle)
